name: Journey To Arcadia
description:
You wake up in a dark cave with no memory of how or why you got there. As you explore the maze, encountering magical obstacles along the way, you begin to find evidence that someone was there before--someone who left behind notes in your own handwriting. Can you solve the mystery of your time in the maze and escape to the promised land of Arcadia?

Due to the time limit much of the game isn't properly polished, and the map isn't fully implemented yet.

Credit:

  • Johnny: Programming
  • Peter: Level Design
  • Quinten: Sound Effects / Music
  • Zoe: Narrative
